summary: In ice hockey, no one is tougher than the "goon". Those players have one mission: to protect the star players at any price.
cast: Donald Brashear|Lyndon Byers|Guy Carbonneau|Don Cherry|Todd Ewen|Stan Fischler|Bob Gainey|Craig Janney|Marty McSorley|Mark Napier|Chris Nilan|Bob Probert|Dan Rather|Serge A. Savard|Paul Shantz|David M. Singer|Bob Sweeney|Tony Twist
title: The Last Gladiators
